name: First Day at Academy (Interactive Demo)
description: Complete playable demo with branching story, multiple choices, and 3 different endings. A slice-of-life visual novel showcasing NovelMind's capabilities including Story Graph, character sprites, backgrounds, animations, sound effects, and the choice system. Uses Graph workflow for visual story editing.
workflowDescription: Visual graph editing - design your story using the Story Graph panel
author: NovelMind Team
targetAudience: New users wanting to see the engine in action, developers looking for a reference implementation
